輚字的基本解释

輚
hàn
古代的一种卧车：“于是后宫乘輚辂，登龙舟。”

輚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhàn］
［《廣韻》士諫切，去諫，崇。］
［《廣韻》士限切，上産，崇。］
(1)卧车。参见“輚輅”。
(2)柩车。

輚字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輚； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1244第17
【廣韻】【集韻】?仕限切，音棧。【集韻】臥車也。【班固·西都賦】乗輚輅。【註】輚輅，臥車。　又【廣韻】兵車也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?仕諫切，棧去聲。義同。　又通作棧。【周禮·春官·巾車】士乗棧車。【詩·小雅】有棧之車。音義同。　或作轏。詳後轏字註。

輚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
輚字的起名意思

暂无。

Shi
Basic explanation of words
Shi
hàn
An ancient type of sleeping car: "So the harem rides on the reel and boarded the dragon boat."
Shi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhàn］
["Guangyun" scholars admonish, go admonish, and worship. ]
["Guangyun" scholars limit cutting, high production, Chong. ]
(1) Sleeping car. See "輚蚂".
(2) The hearse.
Shi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輚; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1244 Page 17
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Official limit cut, sound stack. [Jiyun] Sleeping car too. 【Ban Gu·Xi Du Fu】Cheng Ren. [Note] 蚚蚂, sleep on the car.　[Guangyun] Soldiers.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club]? Official advice cut, the sound of the stack. The same meaning.　Through the stack again. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Towel Car】Taxis take the trestle. [Poetry·Xiaoya] There is a cart with a stack. The sound and meaning are the same.　Or make Shu. Detailed note after the word.
Shi
